description_for_human: Generate or edit images via OpenAI ‘gpt-image-1’.
description_for_model: Use this to create or edit images. Always return the base64 string.

operation.description: The operation to perform: generate, edit, or variation.

size.description: The size of the generated images.

quality.description: The quality of the image that will be generated. 'hd' creates images with finer details and greater consistency across the image.

n.description: The number of images to generate.

image.description: The base64 encoded PNG image to edit or create variations from. Required for 'edit' and 'variation' operations.

mask.description: The base64 encoded PNG mask image with transparent areas indicating where the 'image' should be edited. Required for 'edit' operation.

examples.prompt: A photorealistic image of a cat sitting on a windowsill looking out at a rainy city.
Make the cat wear a small red hat.
examples.mask: [base64 encoded mask highlighting the cat's head]

examples.prompt: Generate a variation of the original cat image.
